name: Burdened Thoughts
components: V, S, M (a lead bearing wrapped in clay)
text: You fill a creature’s mind with the realization of its earthly weight and responsibilities. Disheartened and wearied by these thoughts, the creature gains heavy encumbrance and is unable to fly (if already flying, it must land as soon as possible). If the creature is three or more size categories larger than you, it’s also staggered.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (用黏土包裹的铅轴承)
text_zh:
你让一名生物的心中充满了它在大地上质量与相应责任的体悟。用这些思想让他沮丧、心灰意冷，该生物变成重载(heavy encumbrance)并且无法飞行(如果它已经在飞了，它必须尽可能快的着陆)。

如果该生物的体型比你大三阶段，或超过三阶段，它还会蹒跚(staggered)。
